ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup cold cooked rice, or more to taste
2 green onions, sliced, or more to taste
2 teaspoons soy sauce, or to taste

cookingTips: Use cold cooked rice to prevent sticking and clumping
Heat oil until shimmering before adding rice
Cook eggs until just set, then break into pieces while stirring
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Are you familiar with fried rice techniques? Would you like suggestions for add-ins like vegetables or proteins?
